snippet.title: Transmissible cancer is a time capsule from the earliest dogs
snippet.description: ...Innumerable cases of cancer arise each year throughout the animal kingdom. As far as we're aware, that cancer has only twice outlived the animal in which it originated by spreading to new hosts. One of these forms of cancerstrikes the Tasmanian Deviland appears to have evolved within the last few hundred years. The second circulates among dogs,and its origin has been harder to pin down.Now,...

snippet.title: Where did dogs come from? It turns out we don't really know
snippet.description: ...Dogs were the very first creatures that humans domesticated, and their remains have been found..., archeological, and historic evidence to argue that the history of domestic dogs is such a mess.... The source of domesticated dogs, the gray wolf, historically ranged across all of North America, Europe...

snippet.title: Ubisoft teases May 27 release date for Watch Dogs [Updated]
snippet.description: ...Almost two years after it was first revealed publicly, Ubisoft's open-world, tech-driven spy game Watch Dogs will hit on May 27, the company announced today.The release date appears at the end of a new, story-focused trailer that first appeared on Xbox.com; it was later released...

snippet.title: Ubisoft fighting fraudulent abandonment order for Watch Dogs trademark
snippet.description: ...Ubisoft has filed a petition with the US Patent and Trademark Office fighting what it says is a fraudulent request to abandon its trademark on the upcoming game Watch Dogs.The issue started this weekend, when the USPTO received and filed a "request for Express Abandonment" on one of six Watch Dogs trademarks assigned to Ubisoft. The request covered "Game software and electronic gam...
